issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Specify an app version in the tiapp.xml:

It doesn't work with:
- 1.0.6beta1
- 1.0.6beta
- 1.0.6-1
- 1.0.6 b1
- 1.0.6b1

It won't compile with the following error message:

{quote}
The version may only contist of letters, numbers, dashes, underscores, pluses, and spaces.
[ERROR] :     tiapp.xml contains an invalid version "1.0.6-beta1"
{quote}

It seems related to this pull request: https://github.com/cb1kenobi/titanium_mobile/commit/fb45c30a289c5301590d9a737b7a1a0c0e6d9d17

However, 1.0.6.b1 is accepted.

This problem does not appear with Android.
fields.summary: iOS: App version cannot contain letters or dash
